text: Riverbank is an unincorporated rural community in Mapleton Township, Wellington County, Ontario, Canada. Prior to 1999, Riverbank was located in Maryborough Township. The Conestogo River flows through Riverbank. ==History== A post office was located in Riverbank from 1877 to 1915. The Riverbank Cheese and Butter Company was located at the settlement from 1882 to 1893. By 1910, Riverbank had a general store, and a daily stage to Drayton. The population was about 50. ==References== Category:Communities in Wellington County, Ontario
title: Riverbank, Ontario
